Hi, I am Ruilin Li.

I am currently a first year Ph.D. student in Computational Science and Engineering(CSE) @ Georgia Tech. I obtained my B.S in Mathematics from Fudan University, Shanghai, under supervision of Prof. Wei Lin.

Blog

One Paper a Day

22 Mar 2017

Inspired by Neal Jean's post in Medium, I decide to start my 2017 challenge, reading at least one paper a day. Try to keep track of the lastest progress in the area of machine learning.
